doctor.name: Dr. Md. Abdus Samad Azad
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Abdus Samad Azad is a Cardiac Surgeon in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), MS (Cardiovascular & Thoracic Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Cardiac Surgery at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Stadium Market, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Abdus Samad Azad at Stadium Market, Sylhet is 6p to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
